info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 29 at 2:41PM EDT until October 30 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Upton NY
info.description:
* WHAT...One to locally two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline.
* WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County.
* WHEN...From 2 PM to 9 PM EDT Thursday.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally moderate coastal flooding is possible across the western Great South Bay during Thursday evening high tide. There is also potential of minor coastal flooding during high tide on Friday morning high tide.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 9 PM EDT THURSDAY
